sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Container, Typography, Paper, Box, List, ListItem, ListItemIcon, ListItemText, IconButton } from '@mui/material';
import { Info, Security, Cloud, Update, ArrowBack } from '@mui/icons-material';
import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom';
import '../styles/styles.css';

const About = () => {
  const navigate = useNavigate();

  const handleBackClick = () => {
    navigate('/');
  };

  return (
    <Box className="aboutContainer" sx={{ padding: '4rem 0' }}>
      <IconButton
        onClick={handleBackClick}
        className="aboutBackButton"
        color="primary"
        sx={{ position: 'absolute', top: '1rem', left: '1rem' }}
      >
        <ArrowBack />
      </IconButton>

      <Container maxWidth="md" className="aboutContentContainer">
        <Paper elevation={2} className="aboutPaper" sx={{ padding: '3rem', marginTop: '2rem' }}>
          <Box className="aboutTitleBox" sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', marginBottom: '2rem' }}>
            <Info className="aboutInfoIcon" sx={{ marginRight: '0.5rem' }} />
            <Typography variant="h5" component="h1">
              About Storify
            </Typography>
          </Box>

          <Typography variant="body1" paragraph sx={{ marginBottom: '2rem' }}>
            Storify is a platform that allows you to upload, organize, and access your files from anywhere. Our mission is to provide a seamless and secure file management experience for all users.
          </Typography>

          <List sx={{ marginBottom: '2rem' }}>
            <ListItem>
              <ListItemIcon>
                <Security color="primary" />
              </ListItemIcon>
              <ListItemText 
                primary="Security" 
                secondary="We use advanced encryption to ensure your files are kept safe and secure."
              />
            </ListItem>

            <ListItem>
              <ListItemIcon>
                <Cloud color="primary" />
              </ListItemIcon>
              <ListItemText 
                primary="Cloud Storage" 
                secondary="Access your files from anywhere, at any time, with our reliable cloud storage solutions."
              />
            </ListItem>

            <ListItem>
              <ListItemIcon>
                <Update color="primary" />
              </ListItemIcon>
              <ListItemText 
                primary="Version" 
                secondary="1.0.0"
              />
            </ListItem>
          </List>

          <Box className="aboutFooterBox" sx={{ textAlign: 'center' }}>
            <Typography variant="body2" color="textSecondary">
              Â© {new Date().getFullYear()} Storify. All rights reserved.
            </Typography>
          </Box>
        </Paper>
      </Container>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default About;
